name: Cable Fly
how_to_perform:
1. Stand facing a cable machine with the cables at chest height.
2. Grasp a handle in each hand, keeping your arms straight and holding the handles out to the sides, so that they are parallel to the ground.
3. Focus on using your chest muscles to push the handles apart, extending your arms fully as you squeeze your chest muscles.
4. Hold for a brief moment at the top of the movement.
5. Slowly lower the handles back down to the starting position by bending both elbows and allowing your arms to return to their original position beside your body.
short_summary: The cable fly is a unilateral upper body exercise that primarily works the chest muscles, performed with handle grips in a cable machine.
